name: Quality Inn, Mount Airy, NC

reviews.title: Nice hotel - good location
reviews.text: Stayed here one night on the way home from a trip. Room was clean and comfortable. Property seems well maintained. We choose this hotel because they accept pets. Check in and out was quick and pleasant. I would stay here again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed one night for a short getaway, we found the room to be quiet and clean. We went back and ask for extra towels and promptly got them. They said if you need anything else at all just let us know. We plan to go back to Pilot Mountain this will be where we stay
reviews.title: got all we ask for

likes.liked: — front desk was friendly, the room was quiet
likes.disliked: — the furniture had some stains but no big deal

reviews.text: The room was just ok. Fairly clean, but the heat/ac unit was noisy and turned off and on every 5 minutes. The indian clerk/manager was rude and unpleasant. I stayed only one night and left early. Three hours after I checked out, he called my cell phone and accused me of stealing one of his discusting hotel pillows. Like I would want one of those things. He treatened to charge my card for a pillow! What a jerk. Don't stay there. You might get accused of stealing something when it was probably stolen by the maid.
reviews.title: bad experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed for 4 nights, while visiting mt airy. Our stay here was very good. The rooms were very clean, housekeeping was very helpful. Always made sure we had what ever we needed. Breakfast was good, they could have kept the area wiped down a bit better. Front desk was very friendly. I would recommend to any one travelilng there. It is very convienent to everything. Just a few miles from town and a nice drive to pilot mountain.
reviews.title: fantastic stay

reviews.text: I wrote a review for last year now this year the hotel was even better the beds were so comfortable they had the heavy feather comforters and new air conditioners.i really miss it. If you have to stay in mount airy you have to stay here and the pool is so much fun.And the town mount airy north carolina itself is so beautiful.This hotel is the best hotel i have ever stayed in.
reviews.title: i love mount airy and the hotel

reviews.text: Weary travelers to tired to drive any further. We stopped in Mt. Airy and inquired for rates at several hotels. As we were just looking for some rest before continuing toward home we did not want to pay a lot. The Quality Inn fit our budgetary needs. Hoping for the best, we entered and found a clean, well decorated, well maintained room.
reviews.title: Clean and comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Much better than I expected for the price. Comfortable beds, wireless internet and a continental breakfast. The breakfast was typical, nothing special but not the worst by far. The staff was friendly and courteous.
reviews.title: Good location for Mt. Airy sightseeing

reviews.text: This was a refreshing change from my past experiences with the "economical" choice.
reviews.title: No Problems

likes.liked: — The front dest staff is very helpful
likes.disliked: — the room could use a litte renovation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the bad luck to book here just as NC was getting hit by a massive snow storm. At first the heater didn't work & then, when the maintenance guy got it going, it sounded like a plane revving up. We were offered a small space heater but it was freezing out & we needed something more powerful. The noise woke us up every time the heater went on. Then the light fixture over the sink went out. Stuffing was spilling from the chairs & the room was generally not very clean. I do have to say that the staff was very friendly & were really working hard as many were not able to make it in because of the storm. We stayed 2 nights & roads still were not easily drivable but couldn't take the accommodations any longer so skidded & slid to the next town.
reviews.title: Terrible Place to get stranded in a storm

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The place was fine. The cleaning staff did a great job. The only problem we had was that there were some truckers staying next to us who left at 5am one morning and reved their engine for what seemed like 15 minutes. But I would stay there again.
reviews.title: Nice and Clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: WE really enjoyed our stay. The manager was very friendly, Ruby Tuesday was just across the street and the room was only $49. with a room saver coupon. Would certainly return, the breakfeast was very good with a large selection of items . Andy Griffins were close by.
reviews.title: Excellent stay....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for four nights at the end of September. The room is comfortable, clean and there is a mini fridge in the room. We parked at our door and the check in was quick and pleasant.
reviews.title: Nice Place

likes.liked: — Its close proximity to the surrounding area full of things to do.

reviews.text: There is a nice complimentary breakfast and a free newspaper on week days. Lots of cable tv channels. The only thing I could say negatively would be they come around to do the rooms rather late each day, when we had been out all morning and back to the room to relax and our room hadn't been made up. So two days we just told them to leave towels and not to bother with the beds. We've stayed there several times before and plan to stay again next September.
reviews.title: Just Like Staying With A Favorite Relative For The Weekend

likes.liked: — The large room with complimentary snacks for family gatherings
likes.disliked: — Nothing....couldn't have ask for anything more....

aka: Quality Inn, Mount Airy, Nc Hotel Mount Airy
description: The Quality Inn Hotel is conveniently located just 3 miles from the North Carolina Granite Quarry. This Hotel is close to many Yadkin Valley vineyards, including Black Wolf Vineyards, Shelton Vineyards, Elk Run Vineyards and Old North State Winery. The Blue Ridge Parkway is just 14 miles away. At nearby Hanging Rock State Park, visitors will find boating, fishing, swimming, hiking, rock climbing and picnic areas. Golf courses and tennis courts are also close by.
